title: Looking For ++ Cycle + EPDG + OM + Tolstoi +

posts.post_title: Looking For ++ Cycle + EPDG + OM + Tolstoi +
posts.post_content:
The back-bug is biting strong, and I got the itch :)

Looking For Cycle, EPDG, OM, Tolstoi, Sovereign, and PB.

They can be tough, but there out there.  Have done many, many great deals and trades with many members that fit my needs:

Collect raw, but graded is fine.  Looking for fair to good, with nice images and clean backs.  Basic lower grade flaws, creasing, worn corners, etc. are acceptable.  Really nothing above a PSA3 range.  

Have some stuff to trade.

See other post for OMSL needs, please.

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks, Scott (.... and I can still quit anytime I want :rolleyes:)
